effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.black_white: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.black_white: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.
